name: The Last Day With You
description:
Help Katherine prolong the life of her sick grandmother. Search the scenery for items that will give your grandma a few extra moments with you.

How To Play

Walk - Arrow Keys

Interact - E

Open Inventory - TAB

Exit / Back - ESC
